===Lebanon===
===Lebanon===
{{expand section}}
{{expand section}}
â
Hundreds of [[Lebanon|Lebanese]] protested in the capital [[Beirut]] on February 27 against the country's sectarian political system. Emulating protests that have spread across the Arab world in recent weeks, some Lebanese protesters chanted the now-familiar refrain of "The people want to bring down the regime". <ref>http://af.reuters.com/article/egyptNews/idAFLDE71Q08L20110227</ref>
+
In early January 2011, the [[Lebanese government of November 2009|national unity government]] collapsed after all ten opposition ministers and one presidential appointee resigned due to tensions stemming from the [[Special Tribunal for Lebanon]], which was expected to indict [[Hezbollah]] members in the assassination of former prime minister [[Rafic Hariri]].<ref name="BBC collapse">{{cite news|title=Hezbollah and allies topple Lebanese unity government|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-12170608|accessdate=12 January 2011|newspaper=BBC|date=12 January 2011}}</ref> The collapse plunged Lebanon into its worst political crisis since the 2008 fighting, and indicated further political gains for the Hezbollah-led opposition [[March 8 Alliance]], after the Parliament, in which the [[March 8 Alliance]] gained the majority, elected Najib Mikati as Prime Minister of Lebanon.<ref name="NYT collapse">{{cite news|last=Bakri|first=Nada|title=Resignations Deepen Crisis for Lebanon|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2011/01/13/world/middleeast/13lebanon.html?pagewanted=1&_r=1|accessdate=12 January 2011|newspaper=New York Times|date=12 January 2011}}</ref>
  +   +
Hundreds of [[Lebanon|Lebanese]] protested in the capital [[Beirut]] on February 27 against the country's [[sectarian]] [[Politics of Lebanon|political system]] known as [[Confessionalism (politics)|Confessionalism]]. Emulating protests that have spread across the Arab world in recent weeks, some Lebanese protesters chanted the now-familiar refrain of "The people want to bring down the regime". <ref>http://af.reuters.com/article/egyptNews/idAFLDE71Q08L20110227</ref>
